text: Walled In is a 2009 horror/thriller movie that was produced by Kevin DeWalt and directed by Gilles Paquet-Brenner. ==Plot== The plot of the movie is based on the best-selling novel Les Emmures and is about a woman (Mischa Barton) who discovers past residents who were entombed within the walls of a building by a vicious murderer. ==Other websites== *Walled In's Official website * Category:2009 horror movies Category:2009 thriller movies Category:American horror movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Canadian horror movies Category:English-language movies Category:French horror movies Category:French thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Gilles Paquet-Brenner
title: Walled In
